column1: Uchi////The food was awesome! The right side of your Â menu will have more traditional sushi and sashimi offerings but I strongly encourage you to try that left side of the menu for some adventurous Japanese cusine. We pigged out and had the Hama Chili
column4: the Hot Rock and the Jar Jar Duck in that order. Evidently
column5: the chef curates your meal by like a museum of modern art by serving the food you order in the order he best sees fit and I think he knows what he's talking about. The Hama Chili
column7: and the Duck were definitely highlights but all of the food was fantastic.
